text1: This location is suitable for orbital mining operations. An orbital mining station can be constructed here.
This location is suitable for research purposes. Can used for probes or research stations.
A general location suitable for constructing a general for-profit space station.
Makeshift mining station. Due to modular design has capability to host spaceport, industries and other structures, including expandable storage and stockpiles.
Makeshift research station. Due to modular design has capability to host spaceport, industries and other structures, including expandable storage and stockpiles.
Makeshift commercial station. Due to modular design has capability to host spaceport, industries and other structures, including expandable storage and stockpiles.
